title: Sifu
notes: Epic achievements working Native controller support **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
genre: Indie, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Fighting
description: A third person action game featuring intense hand-to-hand combat, it puts you in control of a young Kung-Fu student on his path of revenge throughout the city.
